title: Creator partnerships are ripe for opportunities, if newsrooms do the work
description: The data has been conclusive this year: A fifth of U.S. adults now regularly get news on TikTok, up from 3% in 2020. This increases to 43% in adults under 30. Much of this news is being disseminated via creators without a journalism background. There is no singular phrase for this type of creator, though...
